select b.CATEGORY_SEQ, b.title , b.contents , b.upload_date , bi.img_name from BOARD b INNER JOIN board_img_rel bir ON b.BOARD_SEQ = bir.BOARD_SEQ INNER JOIN board_img bi ON bir.IMG_SEQ = bi.IMG_SEQ WHERE b.CATEGORY_SEQ = #{CATEGORY_SEQ}
